thvt-shirt-1.name: The "April 1st" Shirt
thvt-shirt-1.description: This is the first-ever merch drop from ThighhighVT!
thvt-shirt-1.longDescription: This is the first ever merch drop from ThighhighVT! It does not actually say placeholder, but rather, it's the word "penis" in bright pink letters with our logo on the back!
